title: narrow sans serif typeface
content:
Hello,

Can anyone please help ID this narrow sans serif typeface used in the logo?: [http://www.behance.net/gallery/Canalla/6685143](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419145057/http:/www.behance.net/gallery/Canalla/6685143 "http://www.behance.net/gallery/Canalla/6685143")

Also, I'm curious as to what the serif typeface used on the black jar is(11th photo scrolling down)?

Thanks in advance!
author: amills

comments.content:
(TAQUERÍA) CANALLA: [Innercity](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419145057/http:/www.tendollarfonts.com/innercity-2-0) by Jacopo Severitano at Ten Dollar Fonts  
TAQUERÍA/SAN PEDRO: [Graphik](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419145057/http:/commercialtype.com/typefaces/graphik) by Christian Schwartz  
CANALLA (serif on black jar): Mercury [Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419145057/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100017)/ [Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419145057/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100016)
